humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are 20 out of 20 assessed lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma in the left axilla, with 2 having extracapsular spread. This information corresponds to N3 stage, as per New Rule 13.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage is determined by the presence and extent of cancer in nearby lymph nodes. In this report, the patient has cancer in 20 out of 20 sentinel lymph nodes (part 1) and all 6 level 3 lymph nodes (part 4) examined, with extra capsular spread observed in 2 of the sentinel lymph nodes (part 1). This extensive lymph node involvement indicates a pathologic N stage of N3.
